lead_paragraph: Ellsbury, the Yankees’ leadoff hitter, tied the single-season record for reaching first on catcher’s interference, an achievement he attributes to his opponents, not himself.

headline.print_headline: Ellsbury’s Bat Finds a Glove Yet Again
headline.main: Jacoby Ellsbury’s Bat: Effective at Finding the Ball, but Also the Glove

snippet: Ellsbury, the Yankees’ leadoff hitter, tied the single-season record for reaching first on catcher’s interference, an achievement he attributes to his opponents, not himself....
abstract: New York Yankees outfielder Jacoby Ellsbury ties Major League Baseball record by reaching first on catcher's interference for 8th time this season; has developed reputation for drawing calls, which has forced catchers to reluctantly adjust.
